[← Back to commands index](./)

Manage and control your minion.

## /minion buy

**Usage**

- `/minion buy [ironman:<boolean>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `ironman` | `boolean` | No | Do you want to be an ironman? | - |

| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `user` | `user` | Yes | The user you want to use the cracker on. | - |

## /minion lamp

**Usage**

- `/minion lamp item:<string> skill:<string> [quantity:<integer>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `item` | `string` | Yes | The item you want to use. | - |
| `skill` | `string` | Yes | The skill you want to use the item on. | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | No | The quantity you want to use. | - |

## /minion kc

**Usage**

- `/minion kc name:<string> [sort:<string>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `name` | `string` | Yes | The monster/thing you want to check your KC of. | - |
| `sort` | `string` | No | How to sort the exported KC list when using the all option. | Alphabetical (A → Z), Highest KC first, Lowest KC first |

## /minion blowpipe

**Usage**

- `/minion blowpipe [remove_darts:<boolean>] [uncharge:<boolean>] [add:<string>] [quantity:<integer>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `remove_darts` | `boolean` | No | Remove all darts from your blowpipe | - |
| `uncharge` | `boolean` | No | Remove all darts and scales from your blowpipe | - |
| `add` | `string` | No | Add darts or scales to your blowpipe | 10 options (see autocomplete) |
| `quantity` | `integer` | No | The quantity of darts/scales to add | - |
